item.title: Re: Kaiju question...
item.content:encoded:
Summoning via the enticement altar is instant. The moment I trigger it, we have the monster. We didn't have a random attack at all today, both were summoned.

I usually try and do a summon (if I'm going to do a summon) at the beginning of the day (immediately after dayroll). Our Crazed Mimiga today were done right at day roll. They had been killed in about 7 hours I think? The monkeys were summoned right after the Mimiga died.

I did two today (and probably will do two tomorrow) because it's possible to get through the the little ones very quickly (especially with this many Sannin).

Chance of getting a fox or demon is relatively small (probably 1 in 26 or something like that), and they do regenerate. But I'm not overly worried about them. Even if they do get a day's regen in, we'll just kill them the next day as things stand right now.

Did that answer your concerns?

item.title: Re: Kaiju question...
item.content:encoded:
It's still random. Whenever a kaiju dies, the kage gets 1 item, and then a second item (of the same kind) is raffled off. Each attack where you did damage gets you 1 ticket. So, it's randomly distributed amongst those who did damage, with the person who did the most damage having the highest chance of getting it.

If the Kage already has the item, he can give it to whoever he wants. Often, this is the person who's got the most attacks.
